sql_create.coins_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS coins (coin_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT);
sql_create.coin_price_today_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS coin_price_today (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, coin_id INT, price FLOAT, price_change FLOAT, low FLOAT, high FLOAT, volume FLOAT, volume_market_cap FLOAT, market_dominance FLOAT, market_cap FLOAT, fully_diluted_market_cap FLOAT, market_rank INT, data_summery TEXT, ts timestamp default current_timestamp);
sql_create.coin_price_today_table2: ALTER TABLE coin_price_today ADD FOREIGN KEY (coin_id) REFERENCES coins (coin_id);
sql_create.coin_price_today_table3: ALTER TABLE coin_price_today ADD UNIQUE (coin_id, price, price_change, low, high, volume, volume_market_cap, market_dominance, market_cap, fully_diluted_market_cap, market_rank);
sql_create.coin_price_yesterday_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS coin_price_yesterday (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, coin_id INT, low FLOAT, high FLOAT, open FLOAT, close FLOAT, coin_change FLOAT, volume FLOAT, ts timestamp default current_timestamp);
sql_create.coin_price_yesterday_table2: ALTER TABLE coin_price_yesterday ADD FOREIGN KEY (coin_id) REFERENCES coins (coin_id);
sql_create.coin_price_yesterday_table3: ALTER TABLE coin_price_yesterday ADD UNIQUE (coin_id, low, high, open, close, coin_change, volume);
sql_create.coin_price_history_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS coin_price_history (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, coin_id INT, 7d_low FLOAT, 7d_high FLOAT, 30d_low FLOAT, 30d_high FLOAT, 90d_low FLOAT, 90d_high FLOAT, 52w_low FLOAT, 52w_high FLOAT, roi FLOAT, ts timestamp default current_timestamp);
sql_create.coin_price_history_table2: ALTER TABLE coin_price_history ADD FOREIGN KEY (coin_id) REFERENCES coins (coin_id);
sql_create.coin_price_history_table3: ALTER TABLE coin_price_history ADD UNIQUE (coin_id, 7d_low, 7d_high, 30d_low, 30d_high, 90d_low, 90d_high, 52w_low, 52w_high, roi);
sql_create.coin_information_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS coin_information (coin_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, info TEXT);
sql_create.cypto_database: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS crypto;

sql_update.coin_price_today_table: INSERT INTO coin_price_today (coin_id, price, price_change, low, high, volume, volume_market_cap, market_dominance, market_cap, fully_diluted_market_cap, market_rank, data_summery) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);
sql_update.coin_price_yesterday_table: INSERT INTO coin_price_yesterday (coin_id, low, high, open, close, coin_change, volume) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);

error_msg.err_coin_not_supported: Error! This coin is not supported!
